full_text: It's beginning to heat up here. People are taking to twitter saying that our Prime Minister has failed the nation. We are in our 3rd lockdown in less than we months and people are beginning to get angry that the guidelines keep changing with many saying that they are vague.

So lockdown for another month, then put back into a tier 4 where I was before this current lockdown. Both of my businesses wrecked, full time homeschooling my child who hasn't seen his friends since last year, this needs to end NOW. 99.78% survival! If only it were about a virus.
